section_a.beneficiaries: D&R TUTORING SERVICES will be operating in the borough Lambeth. Lambeth is considered one of the most deprived and poorest communities in the United Kingdom. Both Southwark and Lambeth have the highest gun and knife crime in London. It has a complex social and ethnic mix, with large African and Portuguese populations, and is an important focus for the UK black Caribbean population. Lambeth has a relatively young age profile. Although it is a largely residential borough, it is a destination for young working age people, rather than families. The company’s activities will provide benefit to. Education plays a pivotal role in the development of any society and our aim is to provide an educational service that is second to none. The population of Lambeth is increasing, and this is projected to continue. This will increase demand for accommodation, and the transport, education and other infrastructure that people need. D&R TUTORING SERVICES will provide tutoring in the core subjects of Mathematics, English and Science. As the need arise, we may offer more subjects. We will provide these tuitions from Primary to Secondary level. We will help to change the conduct of the youths in the community. This will enable them to choose the best alternatives available in any circumstance they face. By educating the community we know it is not only an economic improvement for the community but will help with the wellbeing of people in Lambeth. D&R TUTORING SERVICES will provide an education to the community that will play a role of developing young men and women as fully as possible. in summary the education that we will provide will improve the income level of people in Lambeth which will in turn improve the economic outcome of the boreugh and decrease the crime level on a whale
